question: Which among the following correctly denotes Reserve Money
option2: Currency in Circulation + Other deposits of the General Public with RBI
option3: Currency in circulation + Other deposits of the general Public with RBI + Cash held with the banks
option4: Currency in circulation + Other deposits of the general Public with RBI + Cash held with the banks + Banker’s Deposits with RBI
answer: Currency in circulation + Other deposits of the general Public with RBI + Cash held with the banks + Banker’s Deposits with RBI
